text:
TO:
All Members of NAEB, Region II, *£io Attended
the Seminar-Workshop in Chapel Hill, March 13-14-
PROM : Earl Wynn, Director, Region II
Attached is Bob Sehenkkan7 s report on the Region
II Conference* Both he and I are anxious to have your
comments•
We are hoping, for instance, that after this
settling period new ideas have jelled In your minds.
Won’t you let me have those ideas?
